name: RoyalMailFourStateEncoder
summary: Encodes Royal Mail 4-State Customer Code (RM4SCC) barcodes.

members.name: Encode
members.summary: Encodes a Royal Mail 4-State barcode into a matrix.

parameters.name: includeHeaders
parameters.description: When true, includes start/stop bars and checksum (RM4SCC). When false, encodes KIX (headerless).

members.signature: static BitMatrix Encode(string content, bool includeHeaders)
